reporter_caption.center: MacCORMICK v. N.Y., NEW HAVEN HARTFORD R.R. CO., 209 App. Div. 821 (1924)

caption.center: HANNAH MacCORMICK, as Administratrix, etc., of GERARD MacCORMICK,
Deceased, Respondent, v. THE NEW YORK, NEW HAVEN AND HARTFORD RAILROAD
COMPANY, Defendant, Impleaded with NEW YORK, WESTCHESTER AND BOSTON

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgment and order affirmed, with costs. No opinion.
opinion.panel: Present â€” Clarke, P.J., Dowling, Smith, McAvoy and Martin, JJ.; Smith, J., dissenting on the ground that upon the evidence plaintiff's intestate was guilty of contributory negligence.
